text: Adenia pechuelii is a species of plant in the family Passifloraceae. It is endemic to Namibia. Its population is made up of mostly small subpopulations, and most of these are affected by collecting, but it is currently considered to be a species of least concern.Craven, P. 2004. Adenia pechuelii. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.3.
